translations: n.毕业文凭，学位证书；文凭课程，职业课程；公文，文书

phrs.translation: 大学文凭；（高等学校）文凭、毕业证书
研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程
[美口]文凭制造工厂；野鸡大学；不入流学校

sentences.sentence: Satisfactory completion of the course will lead to the award of the Diploma of Social Work.
sentences.translation: 合格完成此课程者将获得社会福利工作文凭。

sentences.sentence: Only 18.8% of the class of 1982 had some kind of diploma four years after high school, versus 45% of the class of 1972.
sentences.translation: 相对于1972届学生中有45%在中学毕业4年后获得了某种文凭来说，1982届学生的这一比例只有18.8%。

sentences.sentence: I've just finished Level 2 diploma on design.
sentences.translation: 我刚刚获得了二级设计文凭。
